question_text: Language is the basic language web pages are written in.a
Which aspect of web design focuses on creating a visually appealing and user-friendly interface?
What is the purpose of responsive design in web design?
option_a: A) To make the website load faster
option_b: B) To ensure the website looks the same on all devices
option_c: C) To optimize the website for search engines
option_d: D) To make the website adapt and display correctly on various devices
correct_answer: D) To make the website adapt and display correctly on various devices

question_text: Which of the following factors is crucial for creating a positive user experience (UX) on a website?
What is the term used for the arrangement and organization of elements on a webpage?
How does the choice of fonts and typography impact web design?
option_a: A) It affects the loading speed of the website
option_b: B) It influences the website’s ranking in search engines
option_c: C) It enhances the visual appeal and readability of the content
option_d: D) It determines the website’s responsiveness on mobile devices
correct_answer: C) It enhances the visual appeal and readability of the content

question_text: What is the role of call-to-action (CTA) buttons in web design?
option_a: A) To attract more visitors to the website
option_b: b) To encourage users to take specific actions, such as making a purchase or signing up for a newsletter
option_c: c) To optimize the website for search engines
option_d: d) To display the website’s contact information
correct_answer: b) To encourage users to take specific actions, such as making a purchase or signing up for a newsletter

question_text: Why is website speed important in web design?
option_a: a) It affects the website’s ranking in search engines
option_b: b) It enhances the website’s visual appeal
option_c: c) It helps in creating a responsive design
option_d: d) It provides a seamless user experience and improves user satisfaction
correct_answer: d) It provides a seamless user experience and improves user satisfaction
